## mapObjectPromise() function

Maps the values of each of value to a new one asynchronously

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function mapObjectPromise<T, K>(obj: Record<string, T>, transform: (value: T, key: string) => Promiseable<K>): Promise<Record<string, K>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  obj | Record&lt;string, T&gt; | the object to map |
|  transform | (value: T, key: string) =&gt; [Promiseable](./tscgen.promiseable.md)<!-- -->&lt;K&gt; | callback that returns the new value for each key/value pair (can be a promise) |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Record&lt;string, K&gt;&gt;

The new transformed object as a Record wrapped in a promise
